description: Navigate to Commonwealth Bank Town Hall Sydney Branch. The route begins on the train station platform. Turn right to walk along the platform, keeping the tracks on your right-hand side. Continue straight ahead passing the stairs and lift signs; the destination is not visible in the final view.
